div.p:
Curia tenta per ballivos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis nouembris
anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo sexto

The quhilk day comperit befor the balleis sittand in Jugement Alexander
brone of leith' mastir of half ane brokin schip callit peter of leith' and
William Watson factor' and procurator' to Jhone patonson of leith mastir
of the tothir half of the said schip and grantit that thai had sauld al the
said schip with burdis treis tymmir towis takile and al vthir thingis that
pertenis to hir to Androw cantuly of banf for ane certan some of siluer
pait to thame of the quhilk thai grantit thaim wel content and pait
And atour thai oblist tham to warand the said schipe to the said Androw w as
law wile
Curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio eiusdem viijo die novembris anno et cetera lxxxvjto

The quhilk day the aldirman and ballieis with consent of the haile court
the partiis assenting tharto has assignit to thome of mar' to ansuer to Robert
evinson one monunday cum xv dais the xxvij day of nouembre instant'
perempturly but ony dilatour' or delay anent the clame of four' barrellis
of tar for William richertson eftir the tenor' of ane act maid obefor
Curia tenta per ballivos ixo die nouembris ut supra

Quo die Jacobus leslie constituit alexandrum red suum procuratorem ad prosequendum
philippum Dunbrek per iniusta intromissione cum firmis perticarum dicti
burgi in vberiori forma procuratorij promittens de Rato et grato

Curia tenta per balliuos dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem decimo die nouembris
anno Domini ut supra x lxxxvjto

The quhilk day Dauid mar' grantit him avand to Wate of
fiwe markis vsual money of scotland the quhilk some the
chargit the said Dauid to pay within terme of law

The said day the aldirman ballieis and consaile has statute and ordanit
that thar salbe xvj vnce of weilbakyne brede and gude stuf for j d'
and xxxij vnce of weilbakin brede for ij d' vndir the payne of eschet
And nay evile stuf vndir the payne of eschet and payung paying of the vnlaw
vnforgevin

The samyn day William moir' grantit him avand to Katerine Kintor xxj s' and vj d'
quhilk some the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day philp Dunbrek oblist him to vndirly the aldirman and Consale
anent the tak of the rude malis

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif Alexandrum de camera
thomam prat et Andream Cullan balliuos xiijo die nouembris Anno Domini et cetera
octuagesimo sexto

Quo die Johannes rudirfurd de tarlane miles inuenit Johannem Knollis
plegium legalem quod Alexander chamer de murchile et pars suis erit Indempnis
pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris et Idem Johannes rudirfurde promisit fide media per manum suam
ad releuandum et conseruandum dictum Johannem Knollis Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die prefatus alexander chamer de murchile inuenit Dauid mathesone
plegium legalem quod dictus Johannes rudirfurd et pars eius erit Indempnis pro
eo aliter quam per viam Juris et Idem Alexander promisit fide media per manum suam
ad releuandum et conseruandum dictum Dauid Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

The said day the aldirman and consale has fundin and deliuerit that alexander chamer
officiar sale bruke the take of the rude malis and he sal pay the maile of
the samyn that is to say fiwe li' and tene s' yerlie within xv dais eftir lammes
Ande falyeing of the pament of his maile the saide day his tak sale wak
And atour thai haue ordanit philp Dunbrek to restoir the rude malis that he
has resauit

Eodem die ballivi constituerunt alexandrum chamer officialem ad premuniendum Johannem malison
ad intrandum die veneris xvij die nouembris instantis responsurus Johanni Kintor penes
compotum et solucionem iiijor barellarum salmonum tanquam die peremptorio secundum tenorem desuper
confecti

The saide day the aldirman consale and comunite resavit William chamer
commone clerk of the saide burghe and entirit him to the saide clerkschipe
Ande put him in possessione of the samyn be the key of the commone
kyst for ale the dais of his lywe eftir the tenor of his evident vndir
thar comon' seile producit and schavyne to tham tharapon'

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjto die nouembris
anno ut supra lxxxvjto per thomam fif et Andream Cullan ballivos eiusdem

The saide day Jhone Wormet producit ane obligacion of sex barrellis
of Salmonde maid to him be Androw cantuly and Jhon' Colisone
burges of banf vndir thar selis / the quhilk Obligacione and sex
barrellis of Salmond the said Androw grantit And the ballieis
chargit him to pay the said sex barrellis of Salmond' to the said
Jhon' Wormet within the terme of law becaus' the saide Obligacione
was maid apon' the saides Androw and Jhon' Colison' coniunctlie and seueralie
Renunciand ale benefite of diuisione And falyeing of the pament of the
said sex barellis of salmond the saide Androw is oblist to pay xvj li' for tham to the said Jhon
the said day

The saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Robert blindsele
forspekar that Alexander tulloche of montoffir hade done that he aw to do to
Alexander rede anent Ane barrele of Salmonde

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif et Alexandrum chamer
ballivos xvij die mensis nouembris Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo sexto

the saide day Androw maky grantit him avand to William gareache
eldar ane stane of woll the quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay
within the terme of law

The samyn day Androw cantuly forspekar for William Richertson' Ratifeis and appreuis
A decret betuix the said William and Robert evinson' and wile abid and stand
at the samyn befor the aldirman and ballieis in this Courte

the samyn day Comperit Richerd of Cullan grantit him wele content and pait
of ix markis and v s' be the handis of sere Robert leis for franche brone contenit
in ane obligacion maid be the said sere robert and annullis the said obligacion now and foreuire
becaus' it can nocht be gottin

The samyn day it was deliuerit decretit and ordanit be the aldirman ballieis and consale
that Jhone malisone sal content and pay to Jhon' of Kintor the waring' of tua barrellis
of Salmond within terme of law

The samyn day it was deliuerit decretit and fundin be ane assis' that William Richertson
sal releif Robert evinson of iiijor barrelis of tar' at the handis of William portar'

The samyn day it was ordanit be ane assis' that thomas mar' sal content and pay
to alexander rede ane barrel of Salmond within terme of law

the saide day it was deliuerit and ordanit be ane assis' that Richerd of cullane sale
content and pay to Wate auchnewe xxxvj inglis grotis for xviij s' g' in the
erast schipis that cumis out of flandris one the said Richerdis aventouris
the samyn day Androw maky in Amerciament of the court for strubulance of the Curate
the saide Androw in Amerciament of the court for the strubulance of Richerd hile

The samyn day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day aucht dais to Will scharp
to preif that the tar arrestit be the officiar was Robertis of gordonis and nay forstalleris

the samyn day Jhone Kyntor and Jhone malison ar oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand
at the deliuerance of Alexander rede Jhone Wormet Androw murray and thome of mar summissoris chosin
betuix tham anent the tua barrellis of Salmond pertening to Jhon' of Kintor that the said Jhon malison' allegit
was rottin And the said personis ar suorne the gret aith to giffurtht thar deliuerance tharapon
be this next sonday or evin

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo die nouembris anno ut supra per thomam fif
et Andream Cullan ballivos

the samyn day margaret the spous' of Jhon' murtour' in Amerciament of the court
Alexander of myll
distrubulance of the saide

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta per thomam fif alexandrum de camera et thomam
prat ballivos xxo die nouembris ut supra

The quhilk day mariory buchan the spous' of vmquhile Alexander stokar'
producit and schew hir lettres of Junctfeftment vndir sere Robert leis hand and Alexander
redis Seile balye for the tyme of A land liand in the vuirkirkgate the quhilk
scho inhabitis And eftir the said lettres was rede the said mariory askit A balye
to pas' with hir to the samyn land to se A state brokin that was gevin to
Alexander liall of the samyn the quhilk the aldirman and balyeis grantit And
atour scho perofferit hir redy to vndirly the aldirman and ballieis in ony thingis that
the saide Alexander liall hade to say to heir' as hir Jugis ordinar'

The samyne day Alexander of scrogis is oblist be the fatht of his bodie to content and
pay ane barrell of Salmonde to alexander red be mydsummir day next to cum
In presens of thomas prat balye and diuers' witnes

The xxiiij day of nouembir the yer forsaide the aldirman and Consale present
for the tyme has grantit to William yonge the deuocione and profite that
hapinnis be gottin of the prayar bell for the ringyne of the samyn at
sex houris in the evining and xij houris at novne for the quhilkis the
saide William is oblist to make continuale residence and seruice at evinsangis
matutynesmes' and vthir diuyne seruice in the queir' of Abirdene Ande James
of leslie is becumyne souerte for the saide Williamis gude seruice

The saide day Jhone menyeis has fundin Androw Wentone law borghe that alexander
of chamer of murchile and his party salbe vnskathit for him and his party bot as law
wile And the saide Androw is law borghe that thomas prat and his party salbe
vnskathit for the saide Jhon' and his party vthirwais bot as law will And
the saide Jhone is oblist be his hand to freith' the saide Androw and keip him
skathtles' heranent

The saide day Alexander chamer of murchile has fundin James of leslie law borgh
for that Jhone menyeis and his party salbe vnskathit for him and his party bot as law
wile And the saide alexander is oblist be his hand to freith

The saide day thomas prat has fundyne Dauid menyes law borghe that Jhon'
menyeis and his party salbe vnskathit for him and his party bot as law wile Ande
the saide thomas is oblist be his hand to freith' the saide Dauid tharanent

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die mensis nouembris anno Domini et cetera
lxxxvjto

The saide day Dauid gichtan was maid quyt be ane assis' of fiwe s'
gretis clamit one the behalf of patrik Cobane

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that thome cobane sal pay to
robert ouchtirles' the waringe of xxv scheip skinnis and lxj of lenterynvair'
within terme of law

The samyn day thomas prat and Jhone menyeis oblist tham to stand at the ordinance
of the aldirman and consale anent al contrauersiis and debatis betuix thame And thareftir
the aldirman and consale ordanit the saide thomas and Jhon' to stande in cherite and
concord ale tymes to cum And at nane of tham sulde make evile prouocacion tile
vthir nothir in worde nor deide And gif thar happinnis ony discorde a betuix
the saide partiis in tym cuming' the falt being' knavne the party brekande sale pay
xxti li' to Sanct' Nicholes' werk vnforgevyne

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxviijo die nouembris anno ut
supra octuagesimo sexto

The quhilk day thomas prat and Androw branche was oblist be thar handis
to stande at the ordinance of the aldirman and consaile anent al contrauersiis and debatis
betuix thame and of Comunite present for the tyme the quhilkis riply avisit declaris
and findis that ale the haile falt and prouocacion of evile for the tyme that was in
the town was in the saide Androw branche and the said thomas quyt / for
the quhilkis trubule and skathtis thai ordanit the saide Androw to pay tene li' to
Sanct' nicholes' werk in this manere that is to say gif euire the saide Androw
trubulis or iniuris ony nichtbuir of the towne in worde or in deide it being'
fundyne in his defalt Thane furthwith the saide androw sal pay xxti li' to
Sanct nicholes' werk and the aldirman for the tyme salbe dettour for the saide
xxti lib' les' na he ger it be pait to Sanct nicholes' werk

Curia balliuorum burgi antedicti tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die nouembris
Anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto per thomam fif alexandrum de camera thomam prat et Andream
Cullane ballivos

expan.note: This word appears to be followed by a caret, but there is no accompanying one in the text, so this is here included as a heading.

div.p:
The said day the aldirman with consent and assent of the haile Consale
chargit William gibsone belman and the four' officiaris to pas' throw the haile
toune And charge the haile Consale and comunite to cum to the tolbutht for pament
and redschipe of certane lastis of Salmond acht to our' Soueran lord the king and
for the redeming of ane obligacion vndir the commone' Sele gevin tharapon And for the
releuing of gret chargis and escheing' of gret dampnage and skathis appering' to tham
And for diuers' dettis and chargis that the saide burghe was chargit with the quhilkis
belman and officiaris compering the gret bodely aithtis suorne deponit and declarit
that thai hade warnit and chargit be oppin warning of the bell personaly
and at thar hous' the haile consale and comunite to entir and comper in the tolbuth
this saide day for expedicione of the saide thingis / The quhilkis aldirman
Counsaile and comunite being haile gathtreit with ane consent
auisit be oppin Inquisicione maide be the saide officiaris has consentit and assentit for
pament of the saide thingis and redschipe of the towne to sett ande to maile ale thar wattiris
fischingis landis Reuenovis and Rentis quhatsumeuire pertening to the saide burghe' for quhat
termes it ples' the commissaris chosin be tham tharapone or the mast part of thame that is to say
Alexander menyeis aldirman for the tyme Alexander chamer of murchile James leslie Robert blindsel
Dauid menyeis youngar Jhone of Cullan Jhone colison alexander rede and Androw murrary eldar
the quhilkis commissaris was suorne the gret bodely aith' to sett the said wattiris fischingis
landis Rentis and reuenovis quhatsumeuire for the common profit and vtilite of the towne of the
redschip of the saide thingis in safar as the grissomys and profitis that cane be gottin
tharof may extende Ande the remanent to be pait be the haill towne as thai think
mast expedient And the saide consale and comunite promittand to hald ferme and stabile ale and
quhatsumeuire thingis the forsaid commissaris or the mast part of tham in the said thingis ledis
to be done vpon' the quhilkis thai grantit thar commission' vndir thar common' sele to the
said commissaris or the mast part of tham

The said day it was deliuerit be ane assise that Jhone Westlande sal deliuer to Dauid' matheson
and murthow glenmaluyn A bonat of a saile thai payand him for his labour' maid
apon' the Inbringyne of the schipe

The saide day the aldirman counsal and comunite has grauntit to doubill the haile
clerkschip of the towne to be giffin to Robert huchonson' for his seruice in the queir'
and plaing' one the organis as efferis him to do in ale divyne seruice for ane yer
to be complet sone his entre quhil he be pait of xxti lib' And quhar it falyeis
of the duplicacion of the clerkschip to be pait of the haile towne And to be pait
within ane yer

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif and Andream Cullane ballivos
xj die Decembris anno Domini ut supra octuagesimo sexto

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem
div.p:
Jacobus leslie Alexander rede Andreas murrary senior Andreas Wentone Willelmus Andree Junior g
Andreas atkin Willelmus Andree senior Johannes portar Johannes chapmen et Simon craufurd
quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes steuarte quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes steuarte
frater elizibeth' steuart latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra anteriori cum pertinenciis Jacente infra burgum de abirdene in vico inferiori
ecclesie inter terram alexandri scrogis ex orientali ex vna et terram Walteri auchnewe ex occidentali
partibus ex altera et terram Roberti turing' ex australi et communionem viam ex boriali Et quod
dicta elizibeth est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam fratris suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per
annum xxti s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis et quod tenetur de domino Rege in capite pro
seruicium burgale et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legittime per se ipsum ob mortem
quondam dicti Johannis steuart per dimidium annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime
prosequentis datum et clausum sub Sigillo thome fif vnius balliuorum predictorum et sigill'
quorundam quj huic Inquisicionj intererant faciende anno die mense et loco suprascriptis

Item dicte persone Jurate dicunt quod prefatus Johannes steuart fratri frater Agnetis steuart latricis presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de predicta terra et cetera Et quod dicta Agnes est vna de legittimis
et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime
etatis et cetera ut premittitur in omnibus et cetera

The said day the forsaid elizibeth' steuart and Agnes steuart oblist tham be the fathtis
of thar bodiis neuir to annaly the saide lande quhil thai schew sikir certificacion
of the deces' of Androw steuart thar brodir for the quhilkis Jhon' steuart thar
fadir become souerte be his hande to thomas fif bailye
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xv die Decembris anno ut supra

the quhilk day the aldirman bailyeis with auis' of the haile court assignit
monunday next eftir follouing to murthow glenmaluyn to ansuer to the borghe'
strekit apon' him be Jhon colison forspekar for Will nicholson anent h iij li' g'

In the court of Abirdene haldin be the ballieis in the tolbutht of the samyne
the xThis date could also be 'xxviij'. day of December the yer forsaide The quhilk day the ballieis
Wednisday next eftir to Jhone lammyntone' to ansuer til A borch
apon' him be Jhon colison for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of
talche as day of peremptour

the samyne day murthow glenmaluyne was fundin quyt be ane assis' Robert blindsele
forspekar of the pundis gretis clamyt be William nicholison and Jhon' colison' his forspekar
And the said William in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borghe strekin apon' the
saide murthow And the saide murthow quyt of his challance

Curia balliuorum tenta per Andream cullan vnum balliuorum in pretorio eiusdem antepennultimo die
Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto

The quhilk day Jhone scot seruand to thom gray
in Amerciament of the court be his avne tounge graunt for the distrubulance of Riche Waus
gibbe bannerman sandy Kennarty Jok Kennarty and Jok Duncanson vndir nicht and for the avay
takin of A speir fra tham and to Amend as law wile

The said day Jhone steuinsone grauntit him dettour to Copin Andres' skippar for tene
pundis vsual money of scotland for wyne to the chavmerlane to be pait within terme
of law

the said day Jhone ramsay seruand' to thome gray conuict' be ane assis' for the strubulans
of Riche Waus gibbe bannerman sandy Kennarty and Jok Kennarty vndir the nicht and to
to amend as law wile

Item thome gray tailyour' conuikit be ane assis' for strubulance of James Kennarty yongar
thome angouson and sandy tailyour' in the kirk and to amend as law wile / in the nicht
Item the said thomas gray conuikit be ane assis' for a commone nicht wikar

Item James Kennarty thome angouson and sandy tailyour conuikit be ane assis' for the
distrubulance of the said thomas gray vndir the nicht and to amend as law wile
and Ilkan of tham to pay j li' of wax to the hale blud licht in continent or thai
pas' out of the tolbutht Ande gif euire ony of tham committis sic crime in tym cumyn to
be pvnist as law wile

Item alexander gareache conuikit be ane assis' for the distrubulance of Dauid Kintor and Wille
Kintor sonnis to Dauid Kintor and to Amend' as law wile

Item the saidis Dauid and Wille conuikit for distrubulance of the said' Alexander gareache vndir
the nicht and to Amend' as law wile

Item the said partiis with ane avis' of the assis' oblist tham be the faith of thar
bodiis to abide at the ordinance of Alexander chamer of murchil alexander re
d matheson' anent the amendis quhilkis salbe endit be vphal

Item the saide alexander gareache has fundin William gareache eldar his brothir law borghe that
the saidis Dauid and Wille Kintor salbe vnskathit of him and his party bot as law wile
And gif he beis conuikit eftiruart for strubulance of ony of the saidis childer it was deliuerit
be ane assis' that he sale pay tene pundis to Sanct nicholes' kirk

Item the saidis Dauid and Wille has fundin Androw Wentone law borghe that the said alexander
gareache salbe vnskathit for thame and thar party bot as law wile And gif thai be
conuikit eftiruart for strubulance of the saide alexander it was deliuerit be ane assis' that Ilkan
of tham sal pay fiwe li' to Sanct nicholes' werk for the quhilkis the said Androw
come souerte

Item it was ordanit be the aldirman and Counsale that thome gray tailyour for the
strubulance done in the kirk and for nicht waking' and vthir demeritis done be him and his
complicis that he sal cum in his lynnyne clathtis this next sonday in tyme of the hie
mes' with ane candill of ij li' of wax in his hand bair fute and bair heid with a
lous' goune and offir the samyn candile to Sanct nicholes' at the hie altar of the
samyn And atour' the saide thomas sal pay x s' to Sanct nicholes' werk
or he pas' out of the tolbutht And' gif euire he be po conuikit for nicht waking
or sic demeritis bigan he salbe banyst out of the towne in continent but ony proces'
And' in likuis' gif ony seruitoris of his be fundin conuikit in sic faltis or nicht waking'
in tyme cumyne he and thai salbe bannist out of the tone but ony delay

The pennult day of December Dauid matheson' become souerte to thomes fyff
bailye that he sale caus' thome of chamer ane of the balyeis entir befor him
one of the law day next to cum to gif covnt rekning and pament of ale somes of &
malis of the towne of this yer bigan and to ansuer' to the aldirman for the rekning
of him

Item Robert blindsel come souerte to entir William blindsell the said day befor
the balyeis to mak compt rekning and pament of ale the malis of the
burghe the yer bigan And to ansuer to alexander menyes aldirman for
lening of him of the pensionis acht to the erle of crafurd and

In presens of the aldirman In Jugement comperit marcus elb master of the cristofer of
and ordanit mavnis Wormet his lauchfull procurator' to Recouer ale his anchoris towis takile
and al vthir stuff of his saide schip brokin vteuth' the port of Abirdene and to met with the sa
and of his resatis to gif acquitance the said mavnis hafand' the half of the gudis that he
And atour to ask resaue and vptak al gudis Recouerit be ony personis pertening to him and of his
resatis acquitance to gif promittens de Rato et grato Testibus James leslie and William nicholson
